page.title: 09SPORT IN CAREW AREA,TENBY.
page.content: { Carew is a sporting community. Cricket and football clubs rent their ground from the Community Council.The pavillion for both clubs was opened in 1970. The{soccer club}has 2 senior and 2 junior teams.The{1st team were league {champions in 1985}and twice previously The present captain won a Welsh amateur cap. The{cricket club}has 2 senior and 2 junior teams.It has{won the Pembroke_ {shire first division 15 times,the {Harrison Allen Bowl 5 times}and numerous other cups.Several players have won Welsh caps.{The highlight of {1985 was beating St.Fagans in the {Whitbread Village Championship. The{tennis club}opened in 1979 with the help of the Welsh Sports Council. It takes up to 60 members.It holds annual senior & junior tournaments.
